title: WHO endorses protocol for coronavirus herbal medicine trials
author: AFP
description: Covid-19 has raised the issue of using traditional medicines to battle contemporary diseases.The endorsement clearly encouraged testing with criteria similar to those used for molecules developed by labs in Asia, Europe or the Americas
cleaned_text: AM IST] WHO endorses protocol for coronavirus herbal medicine trials Covid-19 has raised the issue of using traditional medicines to battle contemporary diseases The endorsement clearly encouraged testing with criteria similar to those used for molecules developed by labs in Asia, Europe or the Americas [] The World Health Organization endorsed Saturday a protocol for testing African herbal medicines as potential treatments for the coronavirus and other epidemics.
